weapon_description: Most people will find this obsidian-inlaid club quite convincing indeed.
weapon_skill_description: ATK will be increased by  32% for 15s after being affected by Pyro. This effect can be triggered once every 12s. All Elemental DMG Bonus will be increased by 24% for 15s after being affected by Hydro, Cryo, Electro, or Dendro. This effect can be triggered once every 12s.
